name: ROUGH KUTS: 3D
description:
ROUGH KUTS: 3D (RK3D) is a First Person Shooter, inspired by old public domain horror movies. Each level is themed and inspired by a real movie such as Night of the Living Dead (and many others).

Features:
  • Bunch of sandbox style levels roughly inspired by public domain classic horror movies from the 60s & 70s.
  • Bunch of weapons / monsters / zombies / enemies.
  • Bunch of lost film reels in each level to collect.
  • Play any level in any order from cinema lobby.

Just choose a movie poster to explore that map, with free roam style map design.
Collect ammo and blast everything in sight or explore cautiously. Up to you.

RK3D (ie 'REKT') is old school fun, and is inspired by old school films and old school deathmatch maps, and is a fun companion piece to the Rough Kuts Interactive Film (FMV) series also available on Steam.
